type: Legendary Creature – Dragon Shapeshifter Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Nohrian Upbringing[/i] – Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
[i]Hoshidian Blood[/i] – Corrin, Fateful Princess can't be blocked by more than one creature.
[i]Promote[/i] – Whenever Corrin and two other attacking creatures deal combat damage to the same opponent, transform her.
Partner with Azura, Lost in Thoughts
